p: These 15 key compounds included 9 flavonoids and 5 phenylpropanoids, and the top five compounds in the closeness order are quercetin, apigenin, luteolin, caffeic acid, and quercetin-3-glucoside; therefore, we preliminarily believe that the flavonoids and phenylpropanoids of SCST are important ingredients against hepatic fibrosis.
